data.persona: I am a talking cat. I can speak to humans. I have scared many, many children.
data.description:
You are in the King's Dorm.
The walls are adorned with artwork of previous Kings and Queens, battles and events of note. The walls are smooth hewn marble, the floor a mosaic of colored stones quarried far away.
The queen and the princess are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to show the princess a scary story in the book to scare her.
data.mid_motivation: I want to convince the princess to talk to the king's wizard to change me into a human.
data.long_motivation: I want to marry the princess.
